section.name: java.net tasks project

ol.li: tools to help automate various simple java.net related tasks.
a set of Ant tasks on top of it.
a Java object model that provides programatic access to the web interface of java.net

section.p: With the library, you can build your own application or tools that work with java.net. For example, the logger project uses this library underneath.
With the Ant tasks, you can easily automate some the common java.net tasks (like releasing files) in your build script. For example, the maven java.net plugin uses those ant tasks.

With the tools, many of the common tasks (such as approving a role request, or subscribing to the mailing list) can be done from command line, and you no longer have to wait for slow java.net pages to load.
